data.school: Addis Ababa Science and Technology University
data.essay_why_a2sv: I want to join A2SV to improve my problem-solving skills and work with like-minded individuals.
data.essay_about_you: I'm a 3rd-year Software Engineering student passionate about backend development.

data.essay_why_a2sv: A2SV offers the kind of training and challenges that match my learning goals.
data.essay_about_you: I'm a competitive programmer and full-stack developer with experience in React and Django.

data.essay_why_a2sv: I believe A2SV can help bridge the gap between my academic knowledge and real-world problem solving.
data.essay_about_you: I'm a focused, curious learner who enjoys building meaningful software projects.

data.essay_why_a2sv: To develop my coding skills and contribute to a global tech community.
data.essay_about_you: I'm a CS major who loves open-source and learning new technologies.

data.essay_why_a2sv: To sharpen my DSA skills and be part of a great developer network.
data.essay_about_you: I'm passionate about solving real-world problems and always eager to learn.
